properties.title: Maven Dashboard Report Plugin : Taglist support

section.name: About Taglist Support in Maven Dashboard Report Plugin
section.p: Taglist is a proprietary tool that stores its data in an xml file which is generated by default.

ul.li: The last version of taglist-maven-plugin in repository doesn't generate the xml output report.
Extract the source code of taglist-maven-plugin and apply the patch which can be found in Taglist JIRA issue.
